name: vue-goodshare
description: Vue.js component for social share. A simple way to share a link on the pages of your website in the most popular (and not so) social networks.

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:providers
scripts.build:providers: ls src/providers/*.vue | xargs -L1 sh -c 'npx vue-cli-service build --no-clean --target lib --name providers/$(basename $1 .vue) $1' dummy
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf ./docs/* && rm -rf ./src/docs/_book && gitbook build ./src/docs && cp -rf ./src/docs/_book/* ./docs
